thread.title: China condemns terrorist bombings in Ankara, Turkey
thread.title_full: China condemns terrorist bombings in Ankara, Turkey - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: China condemns terrorist bombings in Ankara, Turkey
text: BEIJING - China on Sunday strongly condemned the bombings in the Turkish capital of Ankara. At least 95 people have been killed on Saturday and up to 246 wounded in the pair of explosions, which targeted a peace rally at the central railway station in the city. " We are against terrorist attacks in any form, " Foreign Ministry spokesperson Hua Chunying said in a statement. China supports the efforts from Turkey and other countries in the world to safeguard security and stability, she said.
